exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat height so handles align with mid-chest, back flat against pad
Execution: Push handles forward in controlled motion, pause briefly at full extension
Form cue: Keep shoulders back and down, avoid locking elbows completely

exercises.name: Cable Seated Row
instructions: Setup: Sit with chest up, feet planted, grab handle with neutral grip
Execution: Pull handle to lower chest, squeezing shoulder blades together
Form cue: Lead with elbows, avoid using momentum or leaning back excessively

exercises.name: Shoulder Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat so handles start at shoulder height, core engaged
Execution: Press handles overhead in smooth arc, lower with control
Form cue: Keep wrists straight, avoid pressing too far behind head

exercises.name: Cable Lat Pulldown
instructions: Setup: Adjust thigh pad, grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Execution: Pull bar to upper chest, focus on using lats not arms
Form cue: Lean back slightly, pull elbows down and back

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Setup: Stand upright, elbows at sides, grip rope or bar attachment
Execution: Push weight down by extending forearms, squeeze triceps at bottom
Form cue: Keep elbows stationary, control the weight on return

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit with back flat, feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Execution: Lower weight by bending knees to 90 degrees, press through heels
Form cue: Keep knees aligned with toes, don't let knees cave inward

exercises.name: Hamstring Curl Machine
instructions: Setup: Lie face down, pad positioned just above ankles, hips down
Execution: Curl heels toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings at top
Form cue: Keep hips pressed into pad, control the eccentric portion

exercises.name: Cable Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Setup: Stand facing cable machine, hold bar with overhand grip
Execution: Hinge at hips, push hips back while lowering bar along legs
Form cue: Keep chest up, slight knee bend, feel stretch in hamstrings

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit with back against pad, pad positioned on lower shins
Execution: Extend legs to straighten knees, squeeze quads at top
Form cue: Control the weight down, don't swing or use momentum

exercises.name: Cable Calf Raises
instructions: Setup: Stand on platform with cable weight, balls of feet on edge
Execution: Rise up on toes as high as possible, pause, lower slowly
Form cue: Keep legs straight, full range of motion, squeeze calves at top

exercises.name: Personal Training Session
exercises.sets: Full body workout guided by trainer Josh

exercises.name: Elliptical Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust foot pedals, hold handles lightly for balance
Execution: Maintain steady pace at 65-75% max heart rate, use forward motion

exercises.name: Dynamic Hip Mobility
instructions: Step 1: Leg swings front/back and side/side, 10 each direction per leg
Step 2: Walking lunges with torso rotation, 10 per side

exercises.name: Upper Body Stretching
instructions: Step 1: Shoulder circles and arm crosses, chest doorway stretch 30 seconds
Step 2: Overhead tricep stretch, neck rolls, upper trap stretch each side

exercises.name: Lower Body Stretching
instructions: Step 1: Seated hamstring stretch, figure-4 hip stretch, 45 seconds each
Step 2: Standing quad stretch, calf stretch against wall, 30 seconds each side

sources.title: Essentials: The Science of Love, Desire & Attachment
How Genes Shape Your Risk Taking & Morals | Dr. Kathryn Paige Harden
How Dopamine & Serotonin Shape Decisions, Motivation & Learning | Dr. Read Montague
Essentials: Using Play to Rewire & Improve Your Brain
